motion.guidelines: Use 'framer-motion' for all complex interactions. Prefer 'spring' physics for UI elements.

images.usage: Main landing page hero background with heavy dark overlay
Game details page or Games grid
Cafe menu header or promo card

general: CRITICAL: Use .js extension for all files, but write standard React JSX code.
CRITICAL: Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Orbitron'.
Always start with mobile-first grid (grid-cols-1) and expand to md:grid-cols-12.
Use 'lenis' for smooth scrolling to give a premium feel.
Add a 'grain' texture overlay to the entire body background (opacity 0.03) to reduce digital flatness.
styling: Avoid pure white text (#FFFFFF) on pure black backgrounds. Use #EDEDED for text on #050505.
Use 'z-index' layers effectively: Background < Grain Overlay < Content < Floating UI (Nav/Modal).
For gradients, use 'conic-gradient' for borders instead of linear-gradient for a tech feel.
components: Create a 'Section' wrapper component that handles padding and max-width automatically.
Override Shadcn defaults: Remove rounded corners (rounded-none) for a brutalist/cyberpunk look.
Forms: Inputs should look like terminal entry fields (monospaced font, blinking cursor style).

universal_guidelines: You tend to converge toward generic outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition (transition: all).
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles (sharp, skewed, or pill).
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
